title: NIKO J. CARTER - 123 Meadow Pl Unit A, Cheektowaga, NY 14225

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

SENT VIA EMAIL TO PSDfoils@erie.gov on 6/21/2024

1. Any and all police reports, complaints, and narratives regarding the following address: 123 Meadow Pl Unit A, Cheektowaga, NY 14225 between the following time frame: 01/01/2000 - 6/20/2024.  
 
2.      Any and all police reports, complaints, and narratives regarding the following person between the following time frame: 01/01/2000 - 06/20/2024                                                                                 
 
         (FIRST, M, LAST) NIKO J. CARTER
         DATE OF BIRTH: 09/24/1990

https://www.wivb.com/news/local-news/erie-county/suspended-erie-county-jail-deputy-charged-with-conspiring-to-sell-contraband-to-inmates/
 
****I am requesting the ERIE COUNTY POLICE DEPARTMENT provide a certification letter certifying the correctness for all responsive documents regarding this request. Pursuant to NYS FOIL §89 III (a) states in part "the entity shall provide a copy of such record and certify to the correctness of such copy if so requested". Thank you for your attention and cooperation regarding in this manner. **** 

 have attached the ECSO FOIL form for your convenience. Thanks!

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

The Riford Family

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Pan American Grain Teamsters Election
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

A court document alleges that the NRLB has failed to certify the results of the NRLB-supervised election held at Pan American Grain between November and December 2023: https://www.courtlistener.com/docket/68870205/1/pan-american-grain-manufacturing-v-national-labor-relations-board/

Therefore, I request the following documents:

1) Any communications, emails, messages, and attachments exchanged between NRLB Region 12 Director David Cohen and other NRLB Region 12 personnel concerning the certification of the NRLB-supervised election held at Pan American Grain between November and December 2023.

2) Any communications, emails, messages, and attachments exchanged between NRLB Region 12 Director David Cohen, Hato Rey Officer in Charger Vanessa Garcia, Regional Attorney Christopher Zerby and personnel from Pan American Grain and the Teamsters Local Union No. 901 or their lawyers and representatives concerning the certification of the NRLB-supervised election held at Pan American Grain between November and December 2023.

Keywords; "Pan American Grain," "Teamsters Local Union No. 901," "Unión de Tronquistas de Puerto Rico," "

This request is for all records produced between November 1, 2023 and the date this request is processed.

This request is not being made for commercial purposes. I am an independent journalist from Puerto Rico and any responsive records will be used in the course of reporting for Heavy Weather, a newsletter covering several topics in the Caribbean: https://heavyweather.ghost.io/

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Carlos Berríos Polanco
